overview: Ms. McCullough, a veteran of the software industry, has been serving schools and districts across the U.S. and abroad for over 20 years. Before moving to management of the sales and marketing departments, she was a product support and training specialist. As Vice President of Sales and Marketing, she built the sales and marketing department from one sales representative to a team of 14 with four offices across the U.S. Before assuming the position of CEO, Ms. McCullough served STI as Senior Vice President overseeing the operations and sales and marketing departments of STI. During this time she and her team expanded market share in several states, including two statewide implementations in the Commonwealth of Kentucky and the State of Alabama. Under her leadership and guidance, the customer service department was reorganized to enhance the customer support model. This reorganization yielded several advantages, including continued successful partnerships with STIâ€™s customer base. Prior to her extensive career in the K-12 education arena, Ms. McCullough was also active at the higher education level, serving as Director of Financial Aid at East Mississippi Community College.
